about_the_game:
Get over 9000 new pieces to puzzle! 🐈🧩

WARNING

This DLC makes the game EXTRA HARD!
You will be asked before start if you wish to play with or without it.
Are you pawerful 🐾 enough?

What you get:


  • 1 new DLC exclusive FULL-HD wallpaper 🖼️
  • 3 new sizes per cat (225 🧩 400 🧩 625 🧩) 🐈
  • 1250 new pieces per cat to puzzle 🧩
  • 30000 new pieces in total *

* 30000 new pieces based on the 20 base cats (25000 new pieces) + the new and upcoming 4 seasonal cats (5000 new pieces).

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD A6-9500
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050 / AMD Radeon VEGA or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050 or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended

name: Pussy Puzzle - OVER 9000

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD A6-9500
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050 or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended

short_description: Get OVER 9000 new 🐈🧩 pieces to puzzle in this awesome DLC and make the game EXTRA HARD for all you awesome puzzle veterans out there!
